description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Mississippi Acres Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Cuatro Colinas Cosmetic Pack
description: The contents of this pack are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: Squirrel Jump: Forest Pathway
description: "Squirrel Jump - Forest Pathway" takes you on a charming adventure through 30 levels of vibrant forest puzzles. Leap through platforms, skillfully timing your jumps to reach the cozy Squirrel House. Immerse yourself in this engaging game, guiding the squirrel to its treetop haven!

name: Royal Romances: The Cursed Hearts DLC
description: Unravel the enigmatic tale, confront the shadows of the past, and steer your destiny towards a love that transcends the ordinary!

name: Train Sim World 4: Cargo Line Vol. 1 - Petroleum
description: Discover different freight services with Skyhook Games' Cargo Line for Train Sim World 4. In Volume 1, keep the UK running with modern, VTG-branded TEA tankers, driving heavy fuel-laden services - a flammable challenge awaits.

name: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty - Upheaval in Jingxiang
description: The third DLC, "Upheaval in Jingxiang," depicts Liu Bei's forces as they fight back against the threat of Elixir that has gripped Jing Province since the death of Yu Ji.

name: TheHunter: Call of the Wild - Traveler's Cosmetic Bundle
description: The contents of this bundle are cosmetic only and applicable to all weapons, tents, and ground blinds in the game. They can be previewed in-game for free before purchasing.

name: The Most Searched Playground
description: Uncover 25 of the most searched people, places, and moments from the past 25 years.

name: Your Last Xmas
description: The house formerly belonged to a singer who had some success in the 1980s as part of a duo, singing about tropical holidays and whatnot, before going solo and achieving greater success with his newfound freedom. There were always the rumors however - that he may have been connected a series of gruesome cannibalistic murders. He passed away a few years back, but some say he returns every December 25th - and Last Christmas, he ate people's hearts...

name: Trainz 2019: Pro Train - F-Series: FAA Container
description: Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet. In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.

name: Generation Zero: Reinforced Flakmoped Pack
description: Get the flakmoped fleet for more ways to fight machines and cover a lot of ground fast. Three-wheeled motorbikes modified to carry others on a shielded flatbed, go off road, or bring a mobile crafting station into the field.

name: Across the Obelisk: Amelia, the Queen
description: Amelia, the Queen comes with: A new hero: The Queen, with a set of cards focusing on cold damage and vanishing cards. Rifty, a new pet that removes buffs from your opponents3 skins for The Queen3 new card backs 5 emotes for the QueenNew reply options during events

name: Tower! Simulator 3: VTBS Airport
description: Suvarnabhumi International Airport is the primary airport serving Bangkok, Thailand.Pronounced “su-wan-na-poom” meaning 'The Golden Land', it is one of the largest and busiest airports in Southeast Asia and is a major cargo air freight hub for the region.

name: God of War Ragnarök: Valhalla
description: God of War Ragnarök: Valhalla is a free DLC that introduces a new mode that uses elements of the roguelite genre. Players progress through a series of trials set in procedurally generated levels, where they must choose a relic, shield, and rage ability for each trial run. After completing a challenge within a trial, players can opt for upgrading their weapon, relic, or stats, but these enhancements only apply to that specific trial run. Each run and the completion of specific gameplay challenges unlock permanent rewards. If a player dies, they restart the trial from the beginning. The downloadable content (DLC) also introduces new enemies, including new and familiar ones from the Greek era games like cyclopes and minotaurs.

name: Math is Horror
description: 'Math is Horror' is a math based horror game where you must answer equations to unlock doors in an attempt to escape The Math Clown! Stuck in an asylum where the equations grow more difficult, How many rooms can you survive?

name: Shooting Squirrel Simulator
description: The Checkered Squirrel who shoots cool weapons and parkour through levels in slo mo.

name: Block Control
description: Pink and Blue are running towards the Flag again today. Use 7 blocks with various gimics to reach the flag. There are puzzle maps that test your creativity, and control maps that need to reach the flag in time. Don't give up until you clear all the maps!

name: A different summer
description: A visual novel about a young man with bad grades and "good attributes", punished for a summer, in a remote place with sexy women who love sex. What can go wrong?

name: Risk of Pain
description: Risk of Pain is a hardcore puzzle platformer that challenges you to complete many challenging levels. Use parkour, wit and luck to avoid dying! Are you ready to take a risk?!

name: Champions
description: Dark Fantasy RTS with a tech tree determined by choices in the campaign. Learn the counter play and manage army compositions to challenge the campaign.

name: Soul device
description: Soul Device is a 2D platformer shooter with features of the roguelike genre. On your way you will encounter various items that will strengthen you, equipment that will give you new abilities, and several weapons that will be responsible for your attacks.

name: The 52 Fragments
description: The 52 Fragments are an experimental, esoteric series of games and experiences. Beginning Nov. 1, 2023, one fragment will be added to the library each week for one year. These games examine themes related to identity, agency, perception, and the creative process.

name: Troopstuck
description: In this addictive game, the player embarks on a journey to dominate the battlefield by capturing strategically placed buildings using a combination of soldiers, tanks and aircraft.

name: Onsui
description: Onsui is a cosy puzzle game that has you match colourful creatures without any falling over the edge.

name: Royal Romances: Cursed Hearts - Collector's Edition
description: Join a noble prince and a beautiful princess on their quest to vanquish evil, unearth hidden family secrets, and fight for a moment of respite in each other's arms!

name: After War Town
description: "In the heart-pounding virtual battleground of 'After War Town,' immerse yourself in a gripping shooter experience where the fate of a besieged city lies in your hands.

name: AWA 2024
description: AWA 2024 is a fast paced shoot-em-up featuring modern military aircraft. Choose one of the ten fighter aircraft and take the battle to the skies throughout nine action-packed stages each with their own special end-level boss.

name: Knight's Path: The Tournament
description: Knight's Path: The Tournament is a short medieval RPG featuring challenging combat, an immersive progression system, and a nice little story.

name: Four Lights: Erie Ever route
description: The second story in the urban fantasy romance "Four Lights," Erie Ever Route with horror mystery.

name: Sinabro
description: Sinabro is a 2D adventer platformer game. Explore the level with characters that have different action mechanisms and find ways to break through obstacles. Depending on your proficiency in platformers and avoid genre, the experience of this game will be different.

name: Trip Not
description: Trip Not is a physics-driven, parkour Platformer. Each step accompanied by whimsical voice acting. Watch out, though; a simple misstep spells doom, and every platform is a dynamic physics challenge, Unlike other games in the genre, you can buy shortcuts with money like in real life.

name: HunterX: Code Name T
description: HunterX: Code Name T is an action adventure with fast and stylish combat. Perfect your own fighting style using various weapon actions and magic, and explore an ever-greater world.

name: Dandelion Planet
description: A heartwarming atmosphere,SF novel adventure game. Let's relax on another planet! You enjoy going to different places, interacting with space people, and trying part-time jobs.

name: Detective Hayseed: The Cloning Madness
description: Join the crazy police detective Francis in his search for a kidnapped cloned beauty and go through countless escapades with him in this classic point & click adventure full of comedy.

name: Horny Housewives
description: Horny Housewives is an RPG game that allows you to play as a suburban housewife in a high-stakes world of betrayal, mystery, and adventure. Help attractive women in a suburban neighborhood with their daily tasks, solve puzzles, and make choices that will affect the story.

name: European Expansion + Oceania Expansion + Seasonal Decorative Pack
description:
Wingspan is a relaxing, award-winning strategy card game about birds for 1 to 5 players. Each bird you play extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of your three habitats. Your goal is to discover and attract the best birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

Wingspan: European Expansion takes you on a journey to another continent. Explore diverse European habitats and meet charming, beautiful birds with new interesting abilities.

In the adaptation of the award-winning Wingspan: Oceania Expansion embark on a journey through the breathtaking lands of Oceania. Learn about birds from around Australia and New Zealand and all-new resources and mechanics that will enrich your adventure of creating a wildlife preserve.

In the Seasonal Decorative Pack for Wingspan, you'll get unlimited access to the 7 seasonal backgrounds that have appeared in 2021, along with brand new matching portraits, only available with this pack! With this DLC you will be able to play on your favourite background whenever you want to. Be it a winter background in the middle of summer, or an Easter background in winter - you don’t have to wait for a specific season to use it; you are free as a bird and can choose what and when you want!

name: European Expansion + Oceania Expansion
description:
Wingspan is a relaxing, award-winning strategy card game about birds for 1 to 5 players. Each bird you play extends a chain of powerful combinations in one of your three habitats. Your goal is to discover and attract the best birds to your network of wildlife preserves.

Wingspan: European Expansion takes you on a journey to another continent. Explore diverse European habitats and meet charming, beautiful birds with new interesting abilities.

In the adaptation of the award-winning Wingspan: Oceania Expansion embark on a journey through the breathtaking lands of Oceania. Learn about birds from around Australia and New Zealand and all-new resources and mechanics that will enrich your adventure of creating a wildlife preserve.

name: Sorcevival
description: Sorcerers have nearly succumbed to corruption. In Sorcevival, a horde survivor roguelite, it's time to turn the tide. Choose wisely how to empower your magic spells as you face nightmarish creatures. How far will you go in this battle for survival?

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion + Seasonal Decorative Pack
description:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion
Seasonal Decorative Pack

name: Wingspan + European Expansion + Oceania Expansion
description:
This bundle includes:
WINGSPAN
WINGSPAN: European Expansion
WINGSPAN: Oceania Expansion

name: Endless Furry Tower Defense
description: Slaughter furries before they destroy your base! Get upgrades and climb leaderboards to be the best!

name: Paranox
description: Paranox is a singleplayer horror game. Dive into darkness as a daring paranormal researcher, unraveling the ominous mysteries of a forsaken school. In its haunting corridors, you're not just a spectator—evil lurks in the shadows, stalking your every move. Will you survive the terror?

name: DreadMoon
description: Jump into DreadMoon, a stylized arena FPS blending fast-paced action with stylized visuals. Experience a co-op campaign and a fun multiplayer shootout, all while a captivating soundtrack amplifies every moment. Where echoes of the past meet the thrill of today.

name: The Amnesiac: Final Chapter
description: "The Amnesiac:Final Chapter" is a story-based text game set in a low-magic world. In a crumbling baron's castle, a banquet takes an unexpected turn with the baron's death and everyone's amnesia. Players choose from 10 amnesiacs to uncover their individual stories.

name: Golf Odyssey 2 DX
description: Golf Odyssey 2 DX is the ultimate relaxing and challenging experience in a 2D golf game. Hole out all holes to unlock new and challenging courses, improve your skills and become a real golf legend!

name: Spider Mall!
description: A night of urban exploration goes wrong for Explorer X as he finds himself trapped in an abandoned shopping mall facing off against security guards and a giant hungry spider. You make the choices in this live action bodycam FMV game. Escape the mall or die trying!

name: Project;Hypatios
description: Project;Hypatios is an FPS game inspired by Portal where Aldrich was cursed with a time-loop ability and must escape from Mobius Corps' Hypatios Lab by shooting his way through the chambers.

name: Wisdom Watcher
description: Wisdom Watcher is a new VR shooter set in a clockpunk universe, find the right weapons to face the folkloric monsters inside the arenas and come out on top!

name: Buried Alive: Breathless Rescue
description: Are you ready to embark on a spine-chilling adventure? Step into the shoes of the protagonist and experience the terror of being "Buried Alive" in a crypt. Your mission is clear: Escape the confines of your coffin, find the key to unlock the door, and unveil the dark secrets that lie within.

name: Roguenarok
description: Roguenarok is a top-down action roguelite arena shooter where you play as a mighty viking dinosaur, fighting back extinction from alien invaders. Strategize your counter-attack against diverse enemies by carefully considering the best warrior, weapon, and item to select and build.

name: Quack my Duck
description: Caution, we've lost our ducks! Help John find all the ducks scattered around the city. An exciting hidden object adventure game for all ages.

name: Captain Pawsome
description: Humanity destroyed the climate and left for Mars. Cats are now running the World. Catch rare fishes and find hidden treasures. Clean the environment and craft with recycled resources. Rebuild your Town and Run your own Post-Apo Oceanarium!

name: Cards We're Dealt
description: Wander haunted halls as an office temp and collect magical cards with supernatural abilities to fight demons and save the office from being dragged to hell in this horror, deckbuilding, roguelike game.

name: United 1944
description: Explore a world in ruins, scavenge resources, craft weaponry & equipment and fight for every inch of terrain. Set up and defend your outposts & blow up your enemies' bases. Unlock crafting recipes, skills, and skins. Let the best team tactics win!

name: Deathstreak
description: Deathstreak is a fast-paced, linear single-player action game with a focus on Melee Combat. Deathstreak has environmental storytelling that doesn't interrupt gameplay. Progress by killing the surrounding enemies and bosses and discover the secrets of your world.

name: Hammerwatch II: The Chronicles Edition
description:
Chronicles Edition Includes:
• Hammerwatch II Base Game
• Hammerwatch: Anniversary Edition Base Game
• Anniversary Pack: 20 Additional Colors to Choose from, 2 Additional Voice Packs, 5 Additional Hero Facial Items

name: DarkMatter: The Strange Messenger
description: Explore the Earth that has been transformed by dark matter. Listen to the stories of life told by those who survived the harsh environment. You may not be able to hear their story. Why? You may find it hard to survive in this harsh environment. Don't give up! Your abandonment will make us sad.

name: Dark Riddle
description: Find out the scary secrets of the neighbor.

name: Wingspan: Oceania Expansion
description: In the second expansion to Wingspan, we discover the awe-inspiring birds of Oceania! Wingspan: Oceania Expansion includes new gameplay features, an additional resource - nectar, 95 extraordinary bird cards, and more!

name: Super Sushi Roll
description: Super Sushi Roll is a 2D roll-a-ball platformer. Rotate your chopsticks and roll your sushi to the goal. Master the mechanics, mind the time limit, unlock new sushi rolls, and search for hidden collectibles!

name: Mycosis
description: Mycosis is action-platformer situated in an underground laboratory complex. The gameplay includes fighting various enemies, mostly the fungus infected zombies, collecting different items and solving some simple puzzles. It was inspired by Abuse, Half-life and everyday laboratory work!

name: Gakuin Makyo: High School Crisis
description: A group of boys and girls is thrown out of their world by a sudden earthquake... finding themselves in a new realm—a demon realm filled with strange monsters. Their fight to return begins now.

name: Nothing Door
description:
A puzzle game from a dark dimension.

The Nothing Door is your only escape. But the door is fickle. It lets nothing through... except you. Where will it lead you?

name: No Loose Threads
description: A detective game about the complications of working for a LOT of legal entities.

name: Qdoom
description: QDOOM reimagines the legendary first episode of DOOM (1993), Knee-Deep in the Dead, in the Quake engine. Go toe-to-toe with a deadly tag team of both Quake and DOOM foes in this double-dosed love letter to id Software’s genre-pushing franchises.

name: Alan Wake II: The Final Draft
description:
The Final Draft is the New Game Plus mode for Alan Wake 2, released with Update 13 on December 11, 2023. It includes a new difficulty level (Nightmare), an expanded version of the base ending, new collectables, and other narrative changes/additions.

Players will retain all weapons, Charms and character upgrades earned during their first playthrough.

name: Entities' Repose
description: Entities' Repose is a traffic management game where you are tasked with guiding spirits through the rivers of the underworld. you will need to build the way for them, but soon you will find that there are too many entities!

name: Fun Chess: Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 150 Line Massacre: The Golden Skulls
description: 150 Line Massacre: The Golden Skulls is a 36 map megawad by @NinjaDelphox, featuring maps by @Arsinikk, @Cacodemon187, and @Large Cat, and is a non-canon sequel to 100 Line Massacre. Originally intended as remaster of Ninja’s 5 Maps with 100 Lines, it turned into a full blown sequel featuring “remasters” of these original 5 maps that led to the eventual creation of 100 Line Massacre, along with re imaginings of these maps and 27 entirely new maps, including a previously unreleased 100 Line Massacre map! 150 Line Massa﻿cre also features a new gameplay mechanic: The Golden Skulls! Each map contains a hidden Golden Skull, and is required for a 100% playthrough, displaying a “Skulls” count at the end of each map instead of an item count.

name: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path
description: Fragrant Story: Papaya's Path is a free update for Fragrant Story. This update adds a significant amount of content, and is much larger than the original game.

name: Tru Or Die: Chiraq
description: Step into the gritty and unforgiving streets of Chicago with "Tru or Die Chiraq: Streets of Power," a compelling hood game that puts you in the shoes of a member of the infamous Tru or Die gang. This is your chance to rise to the top in the cutthroat world of Chiraq's street gangs.

name: SNQZ
description: Try to be the biggest and meander your way to the top.

name: Mixx Island: Remix Plus - Platinum Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Coloring Book Series Zoo
description:
Popular coloring game is back.
Come see your favorite ZOO animals!

name: The Smurfs: Learn and Play - Brainy Smurf Hidden Story
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Stars: Special Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Hentai Girls: Legendary Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: Endure
description: Top-down shooter meets existential crisis!

name: Astroneer: Suit Bundle
description: In celebration of our 7th anniversary since Early Access launch and our upcoming 5 year 1.0 anniversary, we are releasing this supporter bundle with a collection of some of our favorite Suits and the much requested “Vintage” set!

name: Astroneer: Essential Bundle
description: Have you missed some of our themed bundles in the past and wished you could just purchase them without waiting? Well then enjoy the “Essential” bundle, containing some of our best rotating bundles in Exo Outfitters!

name: Astroneer: Athlesiure Bundle
description: The Athleisure Suit is a brand new Astroneer Suit exclusively available in this bundle, alongside some of our favorite cosmetic pairings. In addition to the Suit we are bringing back the much requested “Vintage” palette and visor from our archives!

name: Trainz 2022: Pro Train - F-Series: FAA Container
description: Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet. In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.

name: Trainz Plus: Pro Train - F-Series: FAA Container
description: Combine the tried and tested with the modern! The new FAA container wagons used in the UK bring new colour to your fleet. In addition to various weather options, this trolley provides brand new containers that are compatible with the standard 20ft / 40ft container industry.

name: Party Party Time + Royal Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: Party Party Time: Excitement Happy Thrilling Power 4 Pack Set
description: Sin descripción

name: City Bus Driver Simulator
description: Sin descripción

name: Logic Town: Santa's Grotto
description: Step into the festive spirit with "Santa's Grotto," the heartwarming DLC for Logic Town! Featuring a new story chapter, bursting at the seams with over 30 new story puzzles. Then take to the leaderboards with the new Christmas Free Play Puzzle Theme!

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - The Yndrasta, Celestial Spear Pack
description: The Yndrasta, Celestial Spear Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Stormcast Eternals.

name: Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin - The Gobsprakk, The Mouth of Mork Pack
description: The Gobsprakk, The Mouth of Mork Pack introduces a new playable hero to Warhammer Age of Sigmar: Realms of Ruin for Conquest Mode and Multiplayer Mode, bolstering the Orruk Kruleboyz.

name: Slimeboo
description: Boo, a small and adorable slime, has gotten lost on a tropical island. To find his way home, he must leap over all the obstacles in his path. Help him overcome them! Good luck!

name: Born of Bread: Baker Edition
description:
Born of Bread is a wacky and joyful RPG Adventure, revisiting turn-based combat tropes.
Play as Loaf, a flour-golem discovering this enchanting world full of humor, along with a colorful cast of buddies.

The Baker Edition includes:
- Born of Bread
- Digital Artbook & OST

name: Emerging Tactical
description: Take your hero on a quest to become a tactical medic!

name: My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me
description: Join Karl, a forum moderator, and his wife, Stacey, in a tale of suspicion and unexpected turns. Stacey's new boss, Tyrone Bullman, adds complexity to their lives. Explore trust, love, and the unexpected in My Faithful and Loyal Wife Would Never Cheat on Me.

name: Rated Sudoku
description: Presented by Shajiao Games, this is a classic 9x9 Sudoku game comes loaded with lots of puzzles and features. The one game for all your Sudoku needs!

name: Rank Boss Bullets
description: A vertical bullet hell game. Preview and select between three randomly generated options to choose the boss and every add-on you're going to face, then start a time-based survival trial. Difficulty can be scaled infinitely here, and your limit will be tested.

name: Bulldozer Tycoon: Construction Simulator
description: Are you ready to embark on a construction journey like never before?

name: Total blade
description: Medieval overworld RPG, 3d physics battle, massive battle

name: Shhh!
description: Face a terrifying experience but don't scream! If you make noise... It's game over! (You will need a Microphone)!

name: Red Green Donkey
description: Red Green Donkey is a single-player top-down shooter game. You will grope your way through the darkness with the dim light to find the donkey. You will face a variety of enemies, and the only thing you can rely on is the arrows and shields in your hands.

name: Cursed Enigma: Priest and Prayers
description: Father Giovanni, a devout priest, becomes entangled in mysteries and secrets while overseeing his local church. Explore the dark truths and menacing events behind the serene facade of the parish in the first episode of Cursed Enigma: Priest and Prayers

name: CyberVerse Showdown
description: Welcome to CyberVerse Showdown, the ultimate card game set in a futuristic cyberpunk world! Unleash your strategic powers as you assemble a team of powerful cybernetic warriors, hackers, and technologically advanced humans to battle against AI rivals or PVP with a Friend.

name: Harrowed Ground
description: In this early release, the game follows the main character on their first outing with the purpose of prepping to rob the great vaults in their city and sew chaos among the nobles of Orichalc, the City of Brass

name: Multiworlds
description: "Multiworlds" is an online multiplayer game that revolves around the emergence of a terrifying glitch that affects various world environments. As the game's hero, your task is to solve this problem. The game features immersive 3D graphics and includes a variety of puzzles and challenges.

name: Monologue: Winter melancholy
description: In this short but profound story, you will discover that the New Year is not only fun, but also a time for self-reflection. Immerse yourself in an emotional journey that will leave you thoughtful and perhaps with a new perspective on the meaning of this holiday.

name: Cosmic Carnage: Prologue
description: Prepare for an interstellar showdown like no other in a gripping roguelike top-down twin-stick shooter set in the vast depths of space. Pilot your advanced starship, engaging in relentless battles against hordes of alien adversaries. Destroy, Collect, Upgrade, Die, Unlock, Repeat.

name: Surviving with a Bat
description: Surviving with a Bat is an open world game with endless waves of zombies. Your only weapon is a baseball bat.

name: Myth of Future Dimension
description: A real-time strategy game that abandons complicated operations and pursues lightheartedness.Tells a story that............ is not easy to summarize or describe......Experience the cultivation of armaments with a "high degree of freedom".

name: Speed-Deus-Ex-Machine
description: "SPEEDUS" is a competitive card battle game based on the classic card game "Speed." Quickly play cards from your hand that follow the numbers on the field! Use skills and abilities! The first player to play all cards from their deck and hand wins!

name: Arcane Blood: The Shattered Star
description: PLAY as Verana, a young witch and master a variety of spells!! DEFEAT bosses sealed away in forgotten dungeons! UPGRADE Verana's health and magic at Angel Maiden Statues! EXPLORE a great forest, dark caves, sandy waste, and even quaint towns!

name: Zumaji Delux
description: Embark on a perilous journey through the ancient temples of Zumaji, concealed deep within the jungle and teeming with cunning traps

name: Rose Bullet
description: Rose Bullet is a Retro, Comic Style, Horror RPG! Play as a vampire hunter on his way to kill the count and avenge his lost lover.

name: Worker Simulator
description: "Worker Simulator" is an open-world video game where you play as Jack, a newcomer to Land No. 6. The game offers the freedom to explore the island, work in factories, trade with other players, earn money, buy or rent a dream home, and raise animals from young to fully-grown adults.

name: Darkest Dungeon II: The Binding Blade
description: A fearless fencer, a lost knight. One waits at the crossroads for redemption, the other, adrift in the sprawling wilds of the Kingdom. Master the ruthless Duelist, battle through barricades, and seek clues that will lead you to...the last of the Crusaders. This DLC adds 2 new heroes, The Duelist and The Crusader, with their own unique trinkets, signature items, and fully voiced backstories including playable flashback encounters. It also adds a new roaming mini-boss, The Warlord.

name: Rave Gazebo
description: Rave Gazebo is a dance-interactive album. Flail your arms wildly and see the sound and environment respond to your gestures. Experience visuals impossible to see outside of VR! You are in control.

name: Tercity Life Simulator
description: Tercity Life Simulator is an exciting open-world game where you can explore a big city, make friends, start a family, find interesting jobs, buy real estate and more.

name: Mint Christmas
description: Get ready for a festive fun match 3 game. Featuring 2 exciting modes including a 12 round collection mode where you must get all the presents out of the grid before time runs out. Collect powerups and maybe you'll get extra time or perhaps a bomb to keep things moving. Can you beat all 12 rounds?

name: LastRo
description: LastRo is a top-down shooter roguelike where you play robot, which mission is to clear up a lot of floors against different enemies. Your enemies are "evolving", which means they become stronger with each floor and difficulty you beat. Try out different weapons, abilities and upgrades to beat them.

name: Dragon Bobby: The Story of a Life
description: A uniquely beautiful game with third-person exploration and puzzles that tells the story of a man's life from birth. You control a dragon who is an analogy of this man in the story. A true reflection on life.

name: DemonStar: Original Missions
description: The Shareware legend Demonstar comes soaring back with new game modes, revised gameplay, and new Eastereggs to encounter. Originally published in 1997, and later earning Shareware Game of the Year 1999, Demonstar was, and still is one of the highest rated Space shooters ever created.

name: Fallen
description: A minigame collection game where you help people in the town of Havoton to regain your angelic status!

name: Macho Spinner
description: Spin into action in the arena as a whirlwind macho, sending all your opponents flying! "Macho Spinner" is a 3D arena combat game. Forge your mightiest macho and claim the championship of the Macho Spinner Cup!

name: Dusk HD
description: A full visual remaster of DUSK.

name: Highway Cleaners
description: The world is overrun, and your survival depends on your skills behind the wheel. Are you ready to take on the apocalypse and become the ultimate Highway Cleaner? Get behind the wheel, gear up, and let the mayhem begin!

name: Hellbound Ropes
description: 「HellboundRopes」 is a speedrun game with special ropes and various platforming techniques to quickly escape from various obstacles in the city. Try different modes to beat your time!

name: Schism
description: Schism is a challenging roguelite action RPG with guns, gods, leveling, and frequency-switching action. The combination of deep leveling and stat systems, full gun customization, deity worship, intense bullet hell combat, and difficult bosses make for a unique and highly replayable experience.

name: Tiny Touring Cars
description: A fun arcade racing game in a low poly style. Choose from 3 cars and 9 tracks to race against your friends and the AI or try your hand at setting the fastest laps times on the Steam leaderboards.

name: The Lost Prince
description:
The Lost Prince is a story-based package game developed inspired by the fairy tale 'The Little Prince'. It is a visual novel-based complex genre in which the story begins with the assumption that the prince died from a snakebite.

It's an indie game developed by one person, so it's not enough, but please take care of it.

name: Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising - Deluxe Edition
description:
Rise to the challenge in Granblue Fantasy Versus: Rising! This powered up, revamped sequel to GBVS is more enjoyable and accessible than ever before. With simplified input options, even newcomers can engage in thrilling and strategic matches!

The Deluxe Edition includes the main game, 4 color variants for the 28 base characters, 3 weapon skins for the 28 base characters, and the Deluxe Character Pass Part 1 (6 DLC characters and premium avatars, 4 color variants for the 6 DLC characters, 3 weapon skins for the 6 DLC characters, costume "Guider to the Eternal Edge" for Gran, costume "Guider to the Eternal Edge" for Djeeta and Premium Avatar "Vikala (Yin)"). Additionally, the PS4 and PS5 versions include up to 72 hours of Early Access and a Granblue Special Item Set: GBVSR Pack.

name: Cydoku
description: A cyber themed, procedural generated, graphical Sudoku with over 2 million unique play-field permutations. Track your mastery by claiming achievements and gauge your play via in-game statistical analysis and Steam Leader boards!

name: Pogo3D
description: Tough-as-nails 3D platforming using only your mouse! Bounce off platforms and even the walls to reach the next checkpoint. Go on a linear adventure through an interconnected world, or quickly test your skills in challenge mode.

name: Samurai VR
description: Grab a Katana and stand on your daimyo's castle defense, alone against an infinite horde of enemy shinobis. Kill the enemies, hit back shurikens, dodge bombs and beware of enemy Samurais!

name: Hell: Distant Lights
description: Hell: Distant Lights is a low poly puzzle game with shooter elements and a little bit of horror.

name: Spellshot
description: Survive against hordes of zombies using bullets enchanted with spells purchased from a rerolling shop. Spellshot is a fast-paced, rogue-lite fps in which you create unique builds by combining and upgrading spells, activating set bonuses, and collecting rare items.

name: My Incubi Harem
description: My Incubi Harem is a visual novel about how you became an incubi king and ended up with beautiful men in love with you. Featuring a lewd mentor, a hot singer, a queer dom activist, a cold-hearted nobleman, and a sensible daddy. This is the first episode of a game series made by Male Doll.

name: Soul Tolerance
description: A sci-fi investigative RPG with turn-based combat, unique in its genre, set in the city of Sapporo 2214. Explore a beautiful world in voxel art, populated solely by robots. Speak with a plethora of characters, hunt for clues, craft your own minions, and solve a mystery that can change the world.

name: Lodventure
description: Embark on a survival adventure in search of a myth called the Lod Stone in a mysterious wilderness. Discover resources and build your base. Fight with the keepers in the regions with the most suitable equipment for you. And don't forget to enjoy nature.

name: I Hate You, Please Suffer
description: A woman becomes an adventurer and makes friends on a quest to pay rent - and maybe something much more. I Hate You, Please Suffer is an RPG set in a world where becoming an adventurer is a common career choice, where a woman tries to get by and find happiness regardless of how screwed up the world can be. Make money and find success in any way you can: from larger scale quests with loose continuity with each other and the surrounding world, to hunting down assorted weirdos for bounties, to catching fish.

name: Dungeonman
description: Deck out your dungeon! Play the original deck battler/dungeon builder hybrid. Create your own dungeons with a unique set of story-telling tools and battle through other players' campaigns online. Embark on a single-player or co-op quest; follow three heroes pursuing the destructive Dungeonman.

name: Azmar Quest
description: Azmar Quest is an Old School, Story Driven, and Turn Based RPG adventure. It's set in a fantasy world called Azmar, where the danger is around the corner.

name: Flat Machine
description:
In the not-so-distant future, a fate-bound settlement installs a gatekeeper robot with no limbs or memories.

To guard the settlement in this post-apocalyptic world, the gatekeeper robot must respond to various visitors, from mutants and thieves to even rogue microwaves.

name: A Detective Game
description: A simple clicker mystery with some fun art.

name: Resist Resist Resist
description: Sin descripción

name: Kingmaker
description: Create a King by choosing the origins, title, and infamous event of a ruler. A unique story will generate that outlines your King's reign, and how it ends...

name: KGZDoom1
description: You find an old outpost, primitive brick and wood. They have found something evil, and are building a new complex to bring the evil to life.

name: Thirty Years with Doom
description: A classic Doom megawad made by level designers at iddqd.ru to celebrate the anniversary of their beloved game. The maps provide a variety of experiences: there are ones authored by newcomers and by experienced mappers, desert cities and snow-covered bases, compact and very large levels. The first episode is based on the original Doom, while the later maps are variations on Doom II-related themes.

name: The Quinary Conundrum
description: This was produced during NaNoWADMo 2023. It is a sequel to The Lost Magic (you may want to play that first!), and is a fair bit harder in difficulty and far more experimental.

name: Bleedthrough
description: A vanilla-compatible three-episode megaWAD by Jayextee; including some fixes and minor balance tweaks to the maps included from The Becoming.

name: Brutic
description: Mix of Brutalism and Gothic.

name: Crank that Clicker
description: Incremental game for playdate where instead of clicking you use the console's crank.

name: Eviternity II
description:
Eviternity II is a 37-level megawad for Doom II using MBF21-compatible source ports, created by a team lead by Joshua O'Sullivan (Dragonfly). It was released on December 10, 2023, the 30th anniversary of Doom's release and the 5th anniversary of the original Eviternity. Making extensive use of a newly updated build of the OTEX texture pack (to be released as a standalone texture pack in the future), Eviternity II’s six chapters explore a series of unique and varied themes, continuing on from where you left off after the Archangelus’ defeat!

The 37 maps are split in six episodes that each have five regular maps and one secret map, plus one credit map.

name: ChiroTerra
description: Enter the rocky depths of an unmarked cave. Fight for survival and escape with only the gear and supplies you choose to bring. Every item has its advantages and disadvantages, so choose carefully. Once you've entered the cave, there's no turning back.

name: Dirty House
description: Dirty House - An exciting 3D game that will help you relax and unwind. You are an ordinary citizen who has just been hired and you are already full of orders! Your main task is to restore perfect order in the house! Clear rooms of trash, bottles, boxes, broken trash, etc.!

name: Extreme Riding 2
description: Extreme Riding 2 is a continuation of the exciting first part of the game, where new cars and levels await you! Go through unusual obstacles, jump over cliffs, maneuver, and get to the finish line within a certain time! Complete all the tracks and show everyone that you are the best!

name: Shards Online
description: A casual, smooth, physics-based online shooter!

name: Rekindling The Flame
description: Rekindling the Flame is an action RPG game. Hack and slash your way through hordes of enemies. Rebuild your town, Upgrade your equipment, and bolster your skills to face even greater challenges.

name: Sigil II
description: SIGIL II is the unofficial sixth episode for 1993’s DOOM. SIGIL II requires the registered version of DOOM to run.

name: Side To Side
description: ¡Immerse yourself in this incredible universe and get ready for a challenge by pushing your skills to the limit... Let yourself be carried away by its dazzling effects according to the music!

name: 1 Million Zombies
description: 1 Million Zombies is a post-apocalyptic action game where the player takes on a world overrun by hordes of the undead. The objective of the game is to survive as long as possible by driving a series of vehicles and eliminating as many zombies as possible.

name: A Shadow Cast on Water
description: Set in 1920s Arkham, you play as a private investigator trying to solve a mysterious case. Can you uncover the conspiracy that's befalling the city?

name: Fragment of Humanity
description: a first person virtual reality game explore a lab full of dangers, fight creatures.

name: A Christmas Gift: Timmy's Final Gift
description: All Little Timmy wants for Christmas is to play Grand Poo World 3, will he ultimately fulfill that wish?

name: ULTRAKILL: Masquerade Divinity
description: A fan-mod that adds a new playable character and mode to the fast-paced character action FPS, ULTRAKILL.

name: Cyberpunk Men for Cyberpunk Sex
description: Free cyberpunk men for cyberpunk sex - additional customizable handsome undressable male characters with working genitals, and settings to make their bodies even better.

name: Cyberpunk Women for Cyberpunk Sex
description: Free cyberpunk women for cyberpunk sex - additional beautiful customizable female characters in your game

name: Hangul
description: Revisit the map that started it all in this reimagining of E1M1: Hangar, now christened Hangul and set in a demon-infested fortress built into the cliffs of a remote desert. Old secrets and new surprises abound in this tribute to 30 years of 둠

name: I Think I Need Your Help
description:
A strange entity has been keeping Vela up at night so she calls her ex, Mira, to help her figure out what's going on, but none of them knew what they were getting themselves into. Together they venture into a forest full of strange creatures to find answers.

The game takes around 20 minutes and was made for Yuri Game Jam 2023.

name: Aether
description: Aether is a fangame of the classic indie hit, Yume Nikki. A prequel to Nihil, the game follows Hirumataiyo exploring her dreams. With her mindscape split in half, she must collect various Effects while her Shadow watches from deep within her subconscious.

name: Nightmarescape
description: Nightmarescape is an English Yume Nikki fangame. You play as Akari and collect effects while exploring her dreams.

name: Snatchy Carrots
description: Snatch 'dem carrots!

name: Fortnite Festival
description: Play in a band with friends or perform solo on stage with hit music by your favorite artists in Fortnite Festival! On the Main Stage, play a featured rotation of Jam Tracks. Compete against friends for the best performance or team up to climb the leaderboards. The festival is just beginning with more Jam Tracks, Music Icons, concerts, and stages coming soon. Take your stage in Fortnite Festival!

name: Paint It: Christmas Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: Paint It: Christmas Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: PentaZorg
description: PentaZorg is an intense arcade bullet hell that is quite difficult to describe in a single sentence.

name: School Curse
description: ``-School is a cursed place. -That's why I'm going to take revenge...''

name: Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC
description: Get ready for an unforgettable adventure in the world of ship demolition with Ship Graveyard Simulator 2: Warships DLC! Discover epic new warships, earn unique loot, hone your demolition skills, and become a legend in the demolition of warships.

name: Five Nights at Backrooms: Waifu Edition
description: Welcome to Backrooms, to a previously unknown level. The Backrooms are inhabited by special entities that look cute, but when you get close to them, they'll do anything to kill you. Their peculiarity is that they move only at night. Yes, on this level Backrooms has a day and night shift.

name: Bloodshots
description: Immerse yourself in a terrifying survival horror experience set in a laboratory where horrific experiments have been conducted. Take on the role of Joseph Alexander Blackwell, who has to rescue his daughter. To succeed, you will be forced to use your own blood in unusual and twisted ways.

name: Grimhook
description: Descend into Grimhook's sunken ruins as Dart, mastering Lovecraftian powers. Bounce, dash, and grapple through flooded caverns, confronting robotic foes in this fast-paced first-person action platformer. Explore, battle, and unravel the mysteries below Miletos.

name: Cyber Serpent
description: slither and shoot, but don't run out of space! cyber_serpent is an arcade twin-stick shooter combined with snake. compete for a global high score in this modern take on retro classics as you face infinite waves of polygonal enemies.

name: Aqua Pals
description: Dive into the mesmerizing world of aquariums with Aqua Pals, the immersive fish tycoon game where you create your own underwater haven. Transform simple tanks into a thriving aquatic paradise where charming fish flourish. Buy or breed happy fish to compete in dazzling fish pageants for prizes!

name: Foundations
description: In (Foundations), catch a glimpse of two lives on the lam: A pair of fugitives, raiding an abandoned factory to survive. Piece together their pasts, and watch over their fragile partnership as it grows - or crumbles - around the shackles that serve as their only unquestionable bond.

name: Sushi Soul Universe
description: Sushi eating 3D action game! An epic love story with a sushi theme! ……sushi! It's too delicious!

name: Arcade Galaxy
description: Welcome to Arcade Galaxy! Race with cube-animals on obstacle-filled tracks. Use skills like lightning strikes and super jumps to gain an edge. Customize your Cub's look and abilities for a unique racing. Create your own tracks with our advanced editor. Unleash your racing dreams in our galaxy!

name: AntiGolfity
description: A unique spin on the golf genre where you play as the course — in space! Interact with the environment by moving, manipulating, and disabling pieces of the level in order to help guide your ball to the goal.

name: MetaPhysical
description: In MetaPhysical you and up to 5 other friends can go on the hunt for eerie creatures to put an end to their sinister activities! Whether it's an ordinary ghost or a demon, your task is to identify the rumbling creature and then finish it off.

name: Philana and the Elixir of Life
description: A classic style turn-based RPG. Philana is on a journey to find the final ingredients for the Elixir of Life, the only medicine that can save her friend's life.

name: Undertale Yellow
description:
Welcome to Undertale Yellow. In this fan made prequel to the RPG Undertale, you control a human who falls underground into the world of monsters... but will you make it out alive?

Grab your cowboy hat and your gun and take the place of Undertale’s Yellow soul in their journey through the Underground on an original adventure.

name: The Creature in my Dreams
description:
Dreams are so strange, almost like a movie that cannot be skipped.
No sense of direction or rationale.
It's a place where one must face true fear.
This house is where it all started.
With no way to look away from the movie,
I must face what is to come...

name: Dear Elonai
description: Travel back in time in Dear Elonai, a noir point and click game and try to avoid the death of your love live.

name: Ghost Hospital: In Thousand Horror Hill
description: It is a exploration adventure in which the main character roams a magical hospital in search of a friend who has disappeared into another world. The genre is based on a comical atmosphere, with a bit of horror waiting for you deep into the story.

name: Grogger
description: Sling grog to a motley group of thirsty patrons while collecting the empty bottles they send back. Miss an empty bottle or serve a drink to an empty bar and you will lose a life. Difficulty and number of patrons increases as you move through the levels.

name: Mighty Action Heroes
description: Mighty Action Heroes is a real-time multiplayer Battle Royale with an emphasis on fun, skill, and chaos! Collect weapons of varying strengths and duke it out in a cityscape inspired by classic action movie classics from the silver screen and beyond! Outmaneuver your opponents to be the last one standing in this fast and frantic isometric shooter.

name: Minecraft: Jurassic World Adventures
description: Step into a modern world learning to coexist with prehistoric dinosaurs in the wild. Play as one of five iconic characters as you learn to survive encounters with apex predators while helping to protect and rescue vulnerable dinosaurs. Discover familiar locations and vast new regions as you fend off poachers, collect samples, and unlock new mysteries.

name: The Battle of Olympus: Item Randomizer
description: Sin descripción

name: Pipe Dream
description: Pipe Dream, a 5 map miniWAD for GZDoom inspired by the likes of KDiZD, Phobos: Anomaly Reborn and many others.

name: pareidolia in █▄██▄▄
description: angel dressup and selfie simulator with pure love between girls. created for yurijam.

name: Closing at 2
description: In Closing at 2, you play as a bartender at the Lakeside Inn. You get to converse with the customers and make them some delicious drinks. However, as the night goes on, the customers and their orders become a bit... odd. And you better not mess up their order! Do you have the bartending skills to make it 'til 2 am?

name: Zombie Derby Collection
description: Three Zombie Derby games in one bundle!

name: Mina's Garden
description: Classic maze puzzle game for playdate console

name: Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition 2.0
description: The 2.0 update of Super Freaks 1: Ultimate Edition adds two full-length story modes, featuring different gameplay and characters!

name: Train Simulator: Chatham & Medway Valley Scenario Pack
description: Explore the heart of Kentish countryside and take on new challenges across Chatham & Medway Valley with this scenario pack from Suburban Glasgow.

name: Undying: Skin Pack - Series 1
description: Welcome to Undying Skin Pack - Series 1! Download it now, and add a touch of fun to the hard life of survival for mother and child!

name: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: All-Star Battle R - Wonder of U
description: Wield the power of Wonder of U and cause calamity to any opponent that gets in your way! Use the natural laws of calamity to your advantage to inevitably sway victory in your favor!

name: Mega Man Y+1: Operation X.M.A.S.
description: Mega Man Y+1: Operation X.M.A.S. is a bite-sized Mega Man adventure to save Christmas! Featuring 9 unique stages, you'll be taken to all sorts of locales in the hunt for your misplaced belongings. With fortresses made of gingerbread, summery beaches south of the equator, and even Dr. Wily's own chimney, there's no telling where you'll need to go. Don't dawdle, though - these levels don't pull any punches, and you've got time trial records to beat! Aim for gold!

name: Rocket Racing
description: From the developers of Rocket League comes Rocket Racing, a supersonic arcade racer that lets you drift, fly, and boost with your friends through an ever-growing selection of tracks.

name: 25°N 71°W Remastered
description: 25°N 71°W, Bermuda Triangle: An airplane is on its way to America. Suddenly the engines fail. At the end of the day there's a lone survivor: you, stranded on a desert island. Welcome to 25°N 71°W - a survival game where you have to mine, craft and build - to survive somehow! Remastered 2023.

name: Final Fantasy XVI Expansion Pass
description: The Expansion Pass set includes Final Fantasy XVI DLC “Echoes of the Fallen” and “The Rising Tide” at a discounted price.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: The Finals: Season 1
description:
Season 1 was the first season of THE FINALS. It launched along with the game on December 7, 2023, and ended three months later on March 14, 2024.

This season was sponsored by HOLTOW and VOLPE, featuring an all-new arena: Las Vegas.

New content introduced in Season 1 includes:
- Arena: Las Vegas
- New cosmetics
- New Battle Pass
- Weapon: Throwing Knives
- Gadget: Vanishing Bomb
- Game show event: Alien Invasion
- Progression: New career levels

name: Final Fantasy XVI: Echoes of the Fallen
description: Echoes of the Fallen is the first DLC of Final Fantasy XVI, which unlocks a whole new story, battles, weapons, accessories, level cap and more. For players who have completed the required quests, this new adventure begins before the base game’s final battle, as strange, dark crystals begin to circulate on the black market. Players will follow Clive and his friends during their investigations as they encounter a group of suspicious traders, leading them to a long-abandoned Fallen tower known as the Sagespire. There, they will unravel the terrible secrets that await within.

developers.name: Square Enix Creative Business Unit III

name: Guilty Gear: Strive - Additional Character 11: Elphelt Valentine
description: Elphelt is joining Guilty Gear: Strive!

name: Headbangers: Fright or Flight
description: Your Headbanger has never looked so good! Grab the Fright or Flight DLC and show off your new drip to all your friends or dazzle the competition.

name: Power Fantasy: Krampus Night
description: It's Krampus Night and Santas little helpers got corrupted. Help Santa Claus to end the curse and save Christmas!

name: Freaky Trip: Ultimate Edition
description: Sin descripción

name: 3D Puzzle: Wild West
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Rune in the Three Kingdoms
description: The game currently adopts Diablo-like gameplay and data. the concepts of anger system, general system, and attack distance have been emphasized. In order to enhance the game experience, the levels and values ​​required for some data have been modified.

name: Vege Bubble Shoot
description: Pop, Match, Harvest! Dive into a vibrant veggieventure!

name: 3D Puzzle: World War II
description: Collect a 3D puzzle, transferring things to the right places to create a beautiful place.

name: Phantoms
description: "Phantoms" is a retro-styled first-person horror game that takes place on a strange train. Fix an electric box to escape from a level that is random every time... but you're not alone in here. And these "things" will do anything to stop you.

name: Neon Heights
description: In this 3D precision platformer jump and climb your way thorough various obstacles while trying to reach the top of the level. Be sure to use all the tools and skills you gain along the way to help aid you in reaching the goal at the end of the level. One misstep and you'll fall back to the bottom.

name: Snack Of The Kitty
description: Explore Snack of the Kitty, a platformer featuring adventurous cat Kitty on a quest for tasty snacks. Use her plasma weapon to defeat foes, uncover secrets, and traverse mysterious portals. An exhilarating adventure!

name: WarShip
description: Drive a warship to attack the enemy ships, and finally kill the boss of this level to win.

name: Hungry Jungle
description: A 2D survival adventure game. You come to the jungle alone, collect water and real objects, make survival tools to survive, face various beasts, and resist various harsh weather.

name: MundusHex
description: MundusHex is a 3D logic adventure game, transporting players into a world filled with puzzles and mysteries. Explore, combine items, and converse with characters to unravel a captivating story.

name: Barbarians & Beasts
description: Choose your barbarian character to hack and slash many beasts. Swords and magic will fight alongside you against the beasts to free the kingdom.

name: Rocket Frog
description: In this challenging precision platformer, a bubble gum chewing frog bites off a bit more difficulty than he bargained for.

name: Exp10sion
description: Dive into a whimsical journey with various levels in the cycle of explosions and rebirth. "Exp10sion", a pixel-style 2D platformer born in Ludum Dare 51, will tickle your puzzle-solving fancy!

name: Golf Guys: Fantasy
description: Dress up your golfer as a Knight or a Magic boy and try out a new sword bat!

name: Golf Guys: Party
description: Dress up your golfer as a Hot Dog or a Punk boy and try out a new electric guitar bat!

name: Golf Guys: Space
description: Dress up your golfer as a Astronaut or an Alien and try out a new toy hammer bat!

name: Mob Control: Champions
description: Grow your card collection in the armory with Knight mobs, Explodon champions and a new Rocket Barrage ultimate!

name: Mob Control: Triple Backup
description: Grow your card collection in the armory with Soldier mobs, Triple cannon and a new Mass Abduction ultimate!

name: Helix Jump: Party Skins
description: Change the look of your bouncing ball with brand new and unique skins!

name: Helix Jump: Letter Madness
description: Compete in the new multiplayer gameplay mode! Be the first to collect all the letters of the drawn word and become the winner!

name: Golf Guys
description: Face off against a dozen opponents in an ultimate golf battle royale, or invite friends to play in multiplayer mode for up to 4 players!

name: Lollihop
description: Jump into the vibrant VR world of Lollihop - a tasty third-person platformer! Guide a playful platypus with a large lollipop through colorful realms, mastering precise jumps and collecting juicy fruits in immersive stereoscopic vision.

name: Deadville
description: In Deadville, players must face their deepest fears, rely on their survival instincts, and make tough decisions to outlast the apocalypse. Only the most resourceful, cunning, and resilient survivors stand a chance against the relentless zombie horde.

name: Buried Shards
description: Get Inmersed in the intriguing narrative adventure of Buried Shards, progressing through the story chapters while alternating between day and night. Guide your sleepwalking self with house lights during the night and confront the traumas of your past in this unique blend of storytelling and puzzles.

name: Outlanders: Home is Where the Heart is
description: After receiving a letter from an estranged family member, a rookie Leader will journey through the tricky swamps of the Outlands while tracking the steps of his ancestors.

name: Hidden Cats: Magic Forest
description: Hidden Cats: Magic Forest is a hidden object game where you will search for lost cats while exploring the mystery of the magical forest. Touch the enchanting texture of the forest and interact with other surprise objects. Experience the silence and the discovery!

name: I Love You Freddy
description: ah the celebrity life, the fame, and glamour, the wealth, and the insane psychopathic fan girl who chases you around an island she trapped you in, isn't the celebrity life wonderful!

name: Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot
description: Uncover cosmic conspiracies in "Space Detective: The Case of the Rebel Robot," a Sci-Fi Mystery Point-and-Click Adventure with a twist of Yuri Dating Sim. Solve the murder, present your case to the incoming Marshal, and navigate your choices to unlock unexpected lesbian romances!

name: Sex Milfs
description: Sex Milfs - is the simplest 2D puzzle the final goal of which to give you pleasure!

name: Ball of Poo
description: Help Dung Beetle Chan get the dung ball to the goal!

name: In Her Head
description: This is a short visual novel that immerses the player in the inner world of the main character, who suffers from social anxiety and is afraid even of a simple phone call. Experience with her the anxiety, procrastination, and constant struggle with herself.

name: Dimlight Dungeon
description: A dark fantasy dungeon crawler where the player controls a reptilian brawler and travels within the ruins of a once mighty heroic fortress.

name: Luster Beasts
description: Luster Beasts is a Pokémon Stadium style RPG where the player needs to build a team of Luster Beasts in order to take out as many enemy teams as possible before being defeated.

name: Anon's Neko Waifus
description: Discover an enchanting world where cute neko girls await to steal your heart. Immerse yourself in a tale of romance and emotions. It's the perfect getaway for a good time.

name: Foxy Tales
description: Get to know all the foxes, because each of them deserves attention. Dreamy, aggressive, funny, sweet - you will find a fox you like!

name: Id Action Pack Vol. 4
description: A bundle of two Quake games and Doom.

name: Bleed Runner
description: Bleed Runner is a 2.5D cyberpunk beat-em-up in which a lone knight fights an encroaching plague! Suddenly stricken with the disease, seek the cure on the mysterious spaceship and survive by grabbing, throwing, and pummeling enemies for blood.

name: Space Miner: Idle Adventures
description: A casual idle asteroid mining game where you fly around mining and make the numbers go UP! A dash of humor, RPG, science and more.

name: Air Aces
description: Take command of various modern jet fighters (F-16 Falcon, Eurofighter Typhoon, Dassault Rafale) and copters (Bell AH-1 Cobra, Eurocopter EC665 Tiger) in this perfect mix between a realistic flight simulator and a mission based air combat game.

name: Hexceed: Glacialis Pack
description: This DLC unlocks a brand new world for hexceed: Glacialis Puzzle your way through 206 new levels - levels include all previously introduced mechanics!

name: The Smurfs: Colorful Stories
description: Hop into the wonderful world of Smurfs and check what stories are waiting for you!

name: Spinshot Party
description: Join the excitement of a real-life table football game! This game is easy to learn, but challenging to master, making it perfect for players of all skill levels. It's a family-friendly game that's sure to liven up any party.

name: The Dire
description: Dean Holt, popular Urbex vlogger, sets off on another exploration of an abandoned home but this time things aren't going as planned. Something dark is lurking inside and Dean quickly finds himself in over his head

name: Grandma's House: College Days
description: MC goes back to college and has some sex. Your standard cookie-cutter college game with all the staples you've come to expect like walking down a hallway, sleeping in a dorm room and the classic "banging your bully's girlfriend" scene. A prequel short story to Grandma's House

name: Ninja
description: Prepare for an intense clash of strategy in Ninja Empires, an online real-time strategy game that combines the essence of Clash with the stealthy world of ninjas!

name: Cosmic Gunslinger: Alien Outlaws
description: Cosmic Gunslinger: Alien Outlaws is a pulse-pounding single-player video game where you, as the gunslinger cowboy Cosmo, and your trusty canine companion, must survive relentless waves of Aliens. Upgrade your weapons, collect crucial items. Can you outdraw and outlast the alien threat?

name: Stacks: Jungle!
description: Stacks: Jungle! is an engaging adventure card game set in the lush heart of the jungle. Unlock new cards with booster packs, combine them to uncover craft recipes, build amazing structures, venture into uncharted territories, make new friends, discover hidden treasures, and so much more!

name: LaserPoint
description: The turn-based strategy game that requires you to use building elements to hit all the laserpoints on each level with lasertrons! In this game, you'll encounter a variety of lasertrons that can be reflected, refracted, decomposed into a spectrum of lasertrons, or change colors.

name: Color Collar
description: Color Collar is a free to play lighthearted puzzle game for all ages. Play as Aaron the robot dog and fix up the machines of John the scientist in order to open up the mysterious pandora’s lunchbox.

name: Last Night Shift
description: Last Night Shift is a first-person horror game that creates a spooky atmosphere and tension. An ordinary night shift at a motel turns into a living nightmare.

name: Failure to Launch
description: SIMULTANEOUSLY complete whacky minigames while piloting a spaceship through an endless runner of difficult obstacles. Fail a minigame or hit an object and your ship will meet a FIERY EXPLOSION. Are you skilled enough to fly while also finishing minigames? Prepare to LAUNCH INTO FAILURE
